    Gerätemodule
      global
      alexa   ALL3076   ALL4000T   ALL4027   allergy   AMAD   AMADCommBridge   AMADDevice   Aqicn   ArduCounter   Aurora   BDKM   BOSEST   BRAVIA   Broadlink   BS   Calendar   CALVIEW   CM11   CO20   I2C_BMP180   I2C_DS1307   I2C_EEPROM   I2C_HDC1008   I2C_K30   I2C_LCD   I2C_LM75A   I2C_MCP23008   I2C_MCP23017   I2C_MCP342x   I2C_MMA845X   I2C_PCA9532   I2C_PCA9685   I2C_PCF8574   I2C_SHT21
